item.title: What Is Attention?
item.description: Attention is such a fundamental concept that it seems pointless to discuss what it actually means. However, any fundamental concept always carries with it misconceptions perpetuated through tradition. Thereby, it seems most fitting to start with these misconceptions, and then move on to the implications of their dispelling. 1. Attention is not continuous.
